nodes.text: A battle took place in 22 BBY on JanFathal. It started when a workers' strike overthrew the local Regent. Then the Confederacy of Independent Systems began an invasion of Athar. Acclamator-class assault ship Leveler was present tasked with extracting Agent Hallena Devis. Leveler sent new clone troopers from Torrent Company in along with Master Altis's group of Jedi. General Skywalker arrived and extracted the group with a CIS CR-20 troop carrier. The battle ended when Separatist Battle droids claimed control of Athar.
